## Bug Description

**Type:**
- [ ] Broken link
- [ ] Typo / Grammar error
- [ ] Incorrect information
- [ ] Unclear explanation
- [ ] Missing content
- [ ] Formatting issue
- [ ] Other: ___________

**Severity:**
- [ ] Critical - Blocks understanding of core concepts
- [ ] High - Causes significant confusion
- [ ] Medium - Minor confusion or inconvenience
- [ ] Low - Cosmetic or minor improvement

**One-line Summary:** [Brief description of the issue]

## Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure:

- [ ] I've checked this isn't already reported (search existing issues)
- [ ] I've verified this is actually a bug (not a misunderstanding)
- [ ] I've provided enough detail to locate the issue
- [ ] I've suggested a fix if I have one
- [ ] This is about framework documentation (not implementation â†’ use agentops repo)

---

**Note:** For implementation bugs (agents, commands, tools), please report at [agentops repository](https://github.com/boshu2/agentops/issues).

**Thank you for helping improve the AgentOps framework documentation!**
